attributes.action: ALL VENDING MACHINES IN PUBLICLY-OWNED FACILITIES TO BE STOCKED SOLELY WITH HEALTHY PRODUCTS!
attributes.additional_details:
Vending Machines stocked with unhealthy snacks in Leisure Centres fuel obesity in people of all ages!

Crisps, chocolates and fizzy drinks are on sale where adults and children exercise - undermining their efforts towards a healthier lifestyle.

An Act of Parliament is needed to compel all Councils and Leisure Providers to re-consider the food options they are providing to make it easier for both adults and children to make healthier choices.

It should be made a requirement that Vending Machines in publicly-owned facilities are stocked solely with healthy products.

All Local Councils should put health before profit!
